channel.title: Even with the good ip, I cant log in! *Need help!*
channel.description:
Hi all, I cant find the ip of the server on a client, It shouldnt be a closed client, And if some1 could find it, It would be nice! Cya
Client + server: [url=http://www.plunder.com/-download-51eea8f61e.htm]http://www.plunder.com/-download-51eea8f61e.htm[/url]
Edit: New prob, I got the ip of the client but i cant still log in!! Plz help its a great server and I would love to play Again, ( It closed... )

item.title: Even with the good ip, I cant log in! *Need help!*
item.dc:creator: @anyny0 anyny0
item.description:
@anyny0 wrote:

1: I have no-ip but it was to test,
2: The characters of the server were made when pple went on the forums so I dont know if it creates it when we register or when we log in,
3: It still does not work.

Read full topic
item.source: Even with the good ip, I cant log in! *Need help!*

item.title: Even with the good ip, I cant log in! *Need help!*
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“anyny0, post:4, topic:306951”]I have only client.java and 127.0.0.1 or no-ip dont work.

Edit: I found this:

public final class client extends RSApplet {

public final int CLIENT_VERSION = 317; // Client Revision
public final int LOGIN_PORT = 43594; // Login Port
public final String LOGIN_SERVER = "127.0.0.1"; // Login Server IP
public final int REPORT_PORT = 9010;
public final String WEB_SITE = "runedigital.net"; // Website where cache is located
public int myVersion = 1;

, Changed it to 127.0.0.1 But it makes error connecting to server, And in the server, There is no character files…

Does some1 know how to create an account in the server files?[/quote]

Umm if the server you have is no port 5555 cahnge public final int LOGIN_PORT = 43594; // Login Port to this public final int LOGIN_PORT = 5555; // Login Port

If this doesnt work i don’t know what else to do.

EDIT:Charecter files are created when you login.

Read full topic

item.title: Even with the good ip, I cant log in! *Need help!*
item.dc:creator: @anyny0 anyny0
item.description:
@anyny0 wrote:

I have only client.java and 127.0.0.1 or no-ip dont work.

Edit: I found this:

public final class client extends RSApplet {

public final int CLIENT_VERSION = 317; // Client Revision
public final int LOGIN_PORT = 43594; // Login Port
public final String LOGIN_SERVER = "127.0.0.1"; // Login Server IP
public final int REPORT_PORT = 9010;
public final String WEB_SITE = "runedigital.net"; // Website where cache is located
public int myVersion = 1;

, Changed it to 127.0.0.1 But it makes error connecting to server, And in the server, There is no character files…

Does some1 know how to create an account in the server files?

Read full topic

item.title: Even with the good ip, I cant log in! *Need help!*
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Ok i would check for you but i have dial up and it takes me hours to download clients.

Search in the following spots and search the existing ip for the client.

Client.Java
Gui.java[if you have it]
EGUI.java[if you have it]

I hope i helped

Read full topic
